biocontainers.name: splitmem
biocontainers.summary: Graphical pan-genome analysis with suffix skips.

biotools.summary: An algorithm that directly constructs the compressed de Bruijn graph in time and space linear to the total number of genomes for a given maximum genome size.

bioschemas.name: SplitMEM
bioschemas.summary: An algorithm that directly constructs the compressed de Bruijn graph in time and space linear to the total number of genomes for a given maximum genome size.
